data.description:
Welcome to the land of Elementia!

When the universe was young, five celestial beings were born of the elemental forces; Urt, God of the Lands, Osea, God of the Tides; Pyar, God of Embers; Icar, God of Winds; and Axii, Lord of Chaos.

They formed the world and created life, each one pouring their godlike essence into the land, enriching the world with elemental magic.

When their work was done, they reigned together and peace could have been eternal... 

Axii wanted more. The Lord of Chaos worked in secret, forming more and more life in their own image until the balance of nature shifted. The works of Chaos soon overran the land with turmoil and strife.

The other siblings could not risk Axiiâ€™s works breaking the world they created, so they devised a plan to imprison Axii.  The Gods stood in the center of their respective domains and each formed a magical pillar that pierced the world and connected to each other in the center of the planet. The pillars bound Axii inside this domain and prevented them escaping to the surface where they could create more monsters.

With Axii bound to the center of the world, the land of Elementia was once again at peace... for a time.

The influence of Chaos still seeps from the cracks in the surface, and monsters regularly assault the elemental pillars in the hopes of bringing down the source of Chaos' exile.

This is where you come in, Wizard. It is your duty to protect the elemental Tower in this domain, lest Chaos break free!
No pressure...
